data.name: CutScene_1_1
data.value: Jack: A call from HQ during my fishing trip? This better be a wrong number!

data.name: CutScene_1_2
data.value: Jack: General? I hope this is important, this is a perfect day for fly fishing and I would hate if anyone beat me to my favorite spot.

data.name: CutScene_1_3
data.value:
General: The fish will have to wait, Jack. We have an emergency!
At 05:00 yesterday, several telescopes detected unidentified objects in the vicinity of Saturn.
Eighteen hours later, the same objects were in orbit around the moon. Our moon! Jack, those were not asteroids, those are alien ships!

data.name: CutScene_1_4
data.value:
General: Then, one of those ships started moving towards the Earth along with multiple smaller contacts.
They reached us about an hour ago and started attacking major cities and military facilities!
Their technology surpasses ours but we must fight back!

data.name: CutScene_1_5
data.value:
General: There is a research facility close to you where the Meteor fighter prototype is being tested.
You must reach the facility and take the Meteor. Hurry! our radars detected the enemy is on its way to bomb the facility.
I will contact you once you are in the air.

data.name: CutScene_1_6
data.value:
General: I do not always wish my men good luck,
But when I do, it's because the fate of the world is at hand.
Good luck, Jack!

data.name: CutScene_2_1
data.value:
General: I knew you could do it Jack! But this is only the beginning.
We have news here as well. We’ve been able to get some intelligence on the aliens.
Our foes are dinosaurs! Space dinosaurs! But there is more...

data.name: CutScene_2_2
data.value:
General: The President is in the bunker under the White House, but the enemy's mother ship is headed there.
They must have intercepted our communications and now the President is in danger.
You must get there before it's too late and destroy that ship!

data.name: CutScene_2_3
data.value:
General: Based on our information, you will need to first take down the ship’s defenses before you can destroy it.
Use any advanced weapons you can find on the wreckage of enemy ships for that.

data.name: CutScene_3_1
data.value:
After successfully destroying the enemy ship, your fuel gauge starts blinking and you have to make an emergency landing.
Unfortunately your fighter is a plug-in hybrid and there is no charging station around. You decide to contact Headquarters for instructions.

data.name: CutScene_3_2
data.value:
General: Good job, Jack! The President is very grateful!
By destroying the mother ship, you have bought us time to analyze the situation.
However, another wave of enemy ships is en route and will enter our orbit very shortly.

data.name: CutScene_3_3
data.value:
There is a secret research lab South of your position where a space capable version of the Meteor is being tested.
We’ve already dispatched a car to your location, it should arrive shortly.
Take the car and get to the lab immediately.

data.name: CutScene_4_1
data.value:
General: The second enemy wave has entered the atmosphere and they’ve started deploying.
You must reach their mothership and destroy it at all costs!

data.name: CutScene_5_1
data.value:
General: Jack that was fantastic! The remaining space dinosaurs are retreating! You’ve save the world!
Now get back down here, the President is waiting to congratulate you!
